# BD 5.3.13

```{r}
# Vector of n
n = c(5,10,25)
# Get critical values
q9 = qchisq(0.9,df=n)
q99 = qchisq(0.99,df=n)
# CLT approximations
clt9 = pnorm((q9-n)/sqrt(2*n))
clt99 = pnorm((q99-n)/sqrt(2*n))
# Part b
b9 = pnorm(sqrt(2*q9)-sqrt(2*n))
b99 = pnorm(sqrt(2*q99)-sqrt(2*n))
```
